Articles.Content: Arrow key are important for certain people especially left handed. Camera pan can be managed with the mouse, there is already rotations  on it.  This affect playability in a big  scale.
Would it be alright if the arrow keys were used, but in the key bindings screen so you could unbind them or bind them to what you would like them bound to?
of course:) all I need is being able to unbind them to freeely set something else.
